roleset.name: Arranging in a particular fashion

roles.note: the rel cannot be its own argument (if you think the rel should be its own Arg4, for example, it's not an eventive noun)

role.descr: Start state, material from which Arg1 is configured
End state, product of configuration (if sep from Arg1)

roleset.note: Corresponds to configure.01. Framed by anwen April 2011

example.text: Leslie's configuration of the wood blocks looked a lot like a fort.
